title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a sleek and powerful solution to all your humidity needs! With its 1-gallon tank capacity, this black beauty is perfect for maintaining a comfortable and healthy environment in spaces up to 320 square feet.

Experience the soothing comfort of cool mist evaporative technology, which disperses a refreshing 142ml of moisture per hour, ensuring optimal humidity levels without any unwanted white dust. The low tank indicator lets you know when it's time for a refill, so you'll never be caught off guard.

Enjoy the added convenience of a dishwasher-safe tank, making cleaning a breeze. The aroma tray allows you to add your favorite essential oils for a delightful, personalized touch. Choose from three different speed settings using the easy-to-operate mechanical knob, catering to your specific needs with just a simple turn.

Don't worry about empty tank protection; this humidifier has you covered. Weighing only 6.33 lbs, it's easy to move around and can be paired with the BestAir H62 replacement filter for long-lasting freshness.

Bring home the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier today and transform your space into a sanctuary of comfort and tranquility!
